javascript_config.javascript: function main(document) { let sections = []; [['.pop_update', 'font'], ['.rightbox', 'span']].forEach(([s1, s2]) => { let elements = []; document.querySelectorAll(s1+' > ul').forEach((section, i) => { section.querySelectorAll('li').forEach(element => { let a = element.querySelector('a'); let img = a.querySelector('img'); elements.push(new Element( new Link(a.href+'?waring=1'), img.alt, element.querySelector('img').src, '', element.querySelector(s2).textContent.replace(img.alt, '').trim() )); }); sections.push(new Section(document.querySelectorAll(s1+' h1')[i].textContent, elements)); }); }); return sections;}

function search(document) { let elements = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.bookinfo')).map(element => { let a = element.querySelector('a.bookname'); return new Element(new Link(a.href+'?waring=1'), a.textContent, element.querySelector('img').src, element.querySelector('span').textContent, element.querySelector('.chaptername').textContent.replace(a.textContent, '').trim(), '', [new Genre_Player(element.querySelector('p').textContent)]) }); return [new Section('', elements, 'portrait', 'vertical')];}

function info(document) { const replace_url = (url) => url.replace(window.origin, request.url.split('/manga')[0]); let infos = new Infos; infos.title = document.querySelector('h1').textContent.split('Manga')[0]; infos.img = document.querySelector('.bookface img').src; infos.type = 'Manga'; infos.desc = document.querySelector('[itemprop="depion"]').textContent; let msg = document.querySelector('.message'); infos.details = Array.from(msg.querySelectorAll('li')).slice(0,-2).map(li => li.textContent.split(': ')[1]; infos.genres = Array.from(msg.querySelectorAll('a')).slice(0, -4).map(a => new Genre_Player(a.textContent, replace_url(a.href))); const chapterbox = document.querySelector('.chapterbox'); infos.sections.push(new Section(chapterbox.querySelector('h1').textContent, Array.from(chapterbox.querySelectorAll('.chapterbox li')).map(element => { let a = element.querySelector('a'); return new Element(new Link(a.href), a.textContent, infos.img, '', element.querySelector('span').textContent) }).reverse(), 'portrait', 'vertical')); return infos}

function genre(document) { let elements = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.bookinfo')).map(element => { let a = element.querySelector('a.bookname'); return new Element(new Link(a.href+'?waring=1'), a.textContent, element.querySelector('img').src, element.querySelector('span').textContent, element.querySelector('.chaptername').textContent.replace(a.textContent, '').trim(), '', [new Genre_Player(element.querySelector('p').textContent)]) }); return [new Section('', elements, 'portrait', 'vertical')];}
